Name: Verify Successful Navigation to Home Page and Placing an Order
Description: Navigate to the home page and perform a series of actions including hovering, clicking, and inputting information. Proceed to place an order and verify the home page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to https://cellphone-staging.aut.katalon.com/
step 2: Hover over list item
step 3: Click on link
step 4: Click on link  -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
step 5: Click on button
step 6: Click on link ' Place an order' -> Navigate to page 'cart'
step 7: Click on button 'Proceed to checkout '
step 8: Click on link 'K Cellphone Shop'
step 9: Click on link 'K Cellphone Shop' -> Navigate to page ''
step 10: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
